GetUsers()

Retrieves the list of users asynchronously. If successful, the retrieved users are assigned to the 'Users' property. If an error occurs, the error message is assigned to the 'ErrorMessage' property.

| Improve this Doc View Source

InitializeProperties()

Initializes the class properties to their default values. It sets _message to a new Message, _isActiveActionText, _selectedUserActiveText, and _selectedUserColor to an empty string. A new User is also created for _selectedUser, and _users is set to an empty array.

Declaration
public void InitializeProperties()

SetUserGenderAndAvatar()

Sets the gender of the selected user based on the provided value from the view. Updates the user's gender and avatar accordingly.

Declaration
public void SetUserGenderAndAvatar()
| Improve this Doc View Source

SetUserGendersAndAvatars(List<User>)

Sets avatars for a list of users based on their gender.

If the gender is "férfi" or "male", sets the user's gender to "férfi" and assigns the male avatar.

If the gender is "nő" or "female", sets the user's gender to "nő" and assigns the female avatar.

Otherwise, sets the user's gender to "egyéb" and assigns the unknown avatar.

Declaration
public static void SetUserGendersAndAvatars(List<User> users)
Parameters
Type Name Description
System.Collections.Generic.List<User> users
| Improve this Doc View Source
